question: Can I customize the color palettes generated by ThemeMaster AI?
answer: Yes, absolutely. While ThemeMaster AI generates color palettes for you based on your content and preferences, you can always customize the palettes to your liking. You can adjust the brightness, saturation, and other properties of individual colors in the palette, or even create a completely new palette from scratch.

question: How does ThemeMaster AI generate color palettes for my designs?
answer: ThemeMaster AI analyzes the content of your prompt and generates color palettes based on this. You can also provide your own color preferences, which will be taken into account when generating the palettes.

question: Can I save and reuse my color palettes?
answer: Yes, you can save and reuse your color palettes across multiple projects. This ensures that your designs are consistent and on-brand, and saves you time and effort in the design process. With ThemeMaster AI, you can easily access and apply your favorite color palettes whenever you need them.

question: How many color palettes can I generate with ThemeMaster AI?
answer: You can have a maximum of 5 with the free tier, but there is a limit to how many AI generated palletes you can create and that limit is 3.

question: Can I share my color palettes with others?
answer: Yes, you can share your color palettes with others by giving them the link to your palette page. They will be able to view and use your color palette in their own projects.
